name: the last shot (itch)
description:
You have been chosen to operate the HAYMAKER,

 a superweapon of no small import.

Consider yourself the last line of defense for
this country.
You are to remain ready at all times to man
your stations, as when called to action, you
are the sole operator of this device.
We wish you luck.

Controls

CTRL enables the compass to detect the enemy

SHIFT slows and focuses your viewfinder

WSAD moves the viewfinder target

Q toggles the SAFETY

MAKE SURE TO TURN OFF YOUR SAFETY TO FIRE

When ready to shoot, press and hold the SPACE BAR until the weapon is released. 

YOU ONLY HAVE ONE SHOT.
